data.headline: DevOps Engineer | Career Switcher
data.narrative: Experienced IT professional with a diverse background, now transitioning into the thrilling world of DevOps. Honed problem-solving skills and a keen eye for process optimization. Adept at bridging the gap between development and operations, driving seamless collaboration and automation. Skilled in cloud infrastructure, containerization, and CI/CD pipelines. Passionate about leveraging the latest technologies to streamline workflows and deliver exceptional results. Ready to make an impact as a DevOps Engineer and drive continuous improvement within a dynamic organization.
